import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ManageTours = () => { const [tours, setTours] = useState([ { id: 1, title: 'Istanbul Magic', fromCity: 'Tashkent', toCity: 'Istanbul', type: 'B2C', pkg: 'Full', priceAdult: 1200, spots: 25, status: 'Active' }, { id: 2, title: 'Dubai Luxury Expo', fromCity: 'Tashkent', toCity: 'Dubai', type: 'B2B', pkg: 'Partial', priceAdult: 950, spots: 40, status: 'Active' }, { id: 3, title: 'Antalya Summer', fromCity: 'Tashkent', toCity: 'Antalya', type: 'B2C', pkg: 'Full', priceAdult: 1500, spots: 50, status: 'Paused' }, { id: 4, title: 'Samarkand Silk Road', fromCity: 'Tashkent', toCity: 'Samarkand', type: 'B2C', pkg: 'Full', priceAdult: 400, spots: 100, status: 'Active' }, ]); const deleteTour = (id) => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this tour?')) { setTours(tours.filter(t => t.id !== id)); } }; return (

Manage Tours

{tour.title} {tour.fromCity} {tour.toCity}

{tour.status}
); }; export default ManageTours;
